message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, $175 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?
I'm still willing to compromise, Bob! How about we meet at $170? It's the best I can do.
I understand you're willing to compromise, Alice, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle on $165?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! But I still need to get a bit closer to my target price. How about we meet at $168?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer too, Alice! However, $168 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle on $165?
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to make a final offer of $167. This is as low as I can go.

I understand this is your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $167. I'm willing to walk away if I can't get a better deal. I'll make one last offer: $160. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'll take the deal.
